very disappointed.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: The layout and user friendly experience is terrible. Blocky and chunky layout with the color scheme and feel that a 4 year old made it. I honestly felt childish when I used the app. I think the Trump administration needs to learn a thing or two about designing and structure before they embarrass themselves with such a bad app again. Sko tik tok
